messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
How far am I from the Golden Gate Bridge
To calculate that, I need your current location. Could you please provide your latitude and longitude (or a street address) so I can compute the distance to the Golden Gate Bridge?
I don't have my current location.

I’ll need at least an approximate starting point to compute the distance to the Golden Gate Bridge. Could you share:  
- Your current city (or nearest town)  
- A street address or ZIP/postal code  
- Or any landmark you’re near  

Even a rough location will let me estimate the distance.
Not sure, sorry. Can you try finding it by some other method?

I’m not able to detect your location automatically. To estimate how far you are from the Golden Gate Bridge, I’ll need at least a general point of reference—such as:  
• The city or town you’re in  
• A ZIP/postal code or street address  
• A nearby landmark or intersection  

Even a rough location (for example, “I’m in San Jose” or “I’m near downtown Seattle”) will let me compute an approximate distance. Can you share anything like that?
I really don't know my location at all right now.

I’m still unable to detect your location automatically, so I can’t compute the distance without at least a rough starting point. Here are two quick ways you can grab your coordinates or general locale:

1. Find your GPS coordinates  
   • On a smartphone: open your Maps app, tap or long-press on the “blue dot” (your location), and it will display latitude & longitude.  
   • On a desktop browser: go to maps.google.com, click the “Locate” button (target icon), then right-click the blue dot and choose “What’s here?”—you’ll see the coordinates.

2. Provide a city, ZIP/postal code or nearby landmark  
   • Even something like “I’m in downtown Austin, TX,” “My ZIP is 94107,” or “I’m near Times Square” is enough to estimate.

Once you have one of those, just let me know and I’ll calculate how far you are from the Golden Gate Bridge.
